event.kubejs.magic_devil_ball_fill.1: Illegal Operation! Please hold a [debug stick] in your off-hand to perform this action!
event.kubejs.info.1: Welcome to use this mod! The auther is Undefined (This is truely the name of the mod author).
event.kubejs.info.2: The mod has added a large amount of recipies base on vanilla Minecraft and Create mod. You can view them through JEI, REI or EMI mod.
event.kubejs.info.3: If you want to use the mod with full function, you need to install the entire modpack, which can be downloaded from CurseForge or Modrinth.
event.kubejs.info.4: The mod added sequence assembly recipies for reinforced_deepslate, diamond, and budding_amethyst, with the 'Raw Block' added for the crafting process. Meanwhile, rarity level of many items has been changed.
event.kubejs.info.5: What's more, two type of 'coins' have been added as a type of rare material to craft strong items, such as magic_weather_ball, magic_time_ball, etc. By consuming these magic balls, player can do many things that are not able to do in vanilla Minecraft.
event.kubejs.info.6: The last thing to introduce is that many music discs have been added, the music were collected from CIR Server by voting and were made sure that they are free to download in order to avoid copyright issues.
event.kubejs.info.7: Finally I want to thank you for using this mod, and I hope you have a good time in Minecraft! If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact me or raise an issue through Github.
event.kubejs.player_get_head: Congratulations! You have received %s's head by high damage!
event.kubejs.player_get_head_server: Amazing! %s has received a player_head by causing more than 26 points of damage to %s!
event.kubejs.player_hit_villager: Do not try to attack villagers directly! Use other methods instead!
event.kubejs.player_hit_villager_server: %s tried to attack a villager directly and received §cWITHER §6effect form the villager!
event.kubejs.player_hit_panda: Do not try to attack pandas in any way!
event.kubejs.player_hit_panda_server: %s tried to attack a panda directly and received §cINSTANT_DAMAGE III §6effect form the panda!
event.kubejs.player_kill_villager_server: %s killed a villager! Judging the villager's profession
event.kubejs.player_kill_librarian_serve: %s killed a librarian! Disaster will arrive in 5 seconds!
event.kubejs.player_kill_other_server: %s did not kill a librarian and escaped from the disaster.
event.kubejs.banana: Successfullly triggered the BANANA event (from Honkai Star Rail)
event.kubejs.login: Welcome to CIR server or run this gamepack!
event.kubejs.login.2: The auther is bot_undefined, type in '!!KubeJS' to get more information.
event.kubejs.login.3: Type in '!!KubeJS Music' to get information about music discs.Type in '!!KubeJS Craft' to get information about recipies.
event.kubejs.craft.0: This mod has added a large amount of recipies base on vanilla Minecraft Crafting(Elytra, Heart_of_the_Sea, etc.) and Create mod.
event.kubejs.craft.1: Obviously, special coins added by this mod can be used to craft strong items, but with high cost of rare resources.
event.kubejs.craft.2: To get the whole list of recipies, please use JEI, REI or EMI mod.If an item have no recipe, it means that it is not craftable or unusable.
event.kubejs.music.0: This mod added a large amount of music discs from CIR Server, which are free to download or authorized in order to avoid copyright issues.
event.kubejs.music.1: Discs with 16x texture can be dropped by creppers killed by skeletons. Discs by Robin (Honkai Star Rail) can only be crafted. Discs by Hatsune Miku can be collected by mining Random Blocks.
event.kubejs.nuclear_warning_detector_se: Player %s Successfullly Placed the Nuclear Warning Detector at %s, %s, %s
event.kubejs.nuclear_warning_detector_sp: Warning! Nuclear Plant position %s, %s, %s react abnormally! Cheak Immediately!
